name: Video Downloader for Facebook
description: - Video Downloader for Facebook allows you to download and save videos from Facebook to your device to watch them offline and share them later with your friends.  - You can easy download videos from your Facebook news feed, groups, pages, friends, etc... - You can easily download high-quality videos by following simple steps and check them in the video list.  - Easy to download from Facebook without login.  - Support downloading multiple files at once and arranging scientifically.  - You can watch live videos and easily share videos to friends.  *** How to download videos  - Selected Facebook tabs. - Login Facebook with your account. - Click DOWNLOAD to download video. - Click to PLAY video you want to watch this video live on your wall. - Click SHARE to share link with your friends.  *** Features  - Easy to use - Support download videos 4K - Download multi video - Fast download  *** NOTE  - This app is NOT affiliated with or endorsed by the Facebook official network.  - Please respect the copyright of others, any unauthorized re-uploading or downloading of contents and/or violations of Intellectual property rights is the sole responsibility of the user.
